extendedInfo.description: Gaining weight is not as easy as people think. Itâs not enough to just eat more food. To gain weight, you need to know how much nutrition you need and also know how to healthy eat. Besides that you also need motivation to help you insist on it. Weight Gain Assistant is a good tool that will assist you while gaining weight.Setting a goal, and the Weight Gain Assistant will generate the amount of calories you need every day. Based on the amount of calories, the Weight Gain Assistant will generate a daily food plan to help balance your nutrition each day while gaining weight. The daily food plan is generated based on âDietary Guidelines for Americansâ from USDA.Tracking your daily nutritional and weight. Weight Gain Assistant can help to monitor you daily progress, view charts of your progress over time for motivation.- Calculate your calories you need to gain weight.- Create a daily food plan to suit your needs.- Log your calories with just a few taps.- Peruse a comprehensive database of foods.- Track weight progress and creates a weight chart for monitoring.

reviews.title: I tried
reviews.comment: Seemed like the app would be a great help for me tracking food intake... wish it wouldn\'t forceclose ; (
reviews.author: Shirlundria Williams

reviews.title: sadness
reviews.comment: Would have been a good app too. glitches with certain keyboards, force closing. unusable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: I wish this app had a bar code scanner to help easier enter my daily food intake, this could be a thousand percent better with that little change.
reviews.author: Danielle Bachman

reviews.title: It sucks
reviews.comment: This app is trash it stops  every time.
reviews.author: bosh baptiste

reviews.title: Nah
reviews.comment: It always foreclose and it don\'t really work a waste of time! But it does show u what u have to eat...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frustration
reviews.comment: This woulda been the perfect app,... if it worked. If you can\'t add what you eat, whats the point????VERY DISAPPOINTING!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes & Metric
reviews.comment: It crashes very often and only measures using metric units. Will be deleting.  But nice idea!:) The bug s need to be fixed & an option to include US measurements needs to be put in and this could be a really useful app for weight gainers!
reviews.author: Gabrielle Sampson

reviews.title: Crappy.
reviews.comment: I thought I\'d try it out.. you know disregard what the other people were saying about it force closing.. bit it turns out I should have listened to them because this sucks. You can\'t even use it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Closes at every entry. Please fix. Great app if it would only work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A let down
reviews.comment: I was pretty amped to see they had an app for weight loss. Between the forced closing and they never had the food you\'ve eat ten in their little inventory its a waste of storage.
reviews.author: Sarah Nash

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: I could never find the food but when i add my own the app closes. Please fix!
reviews.author: Jazmine Davis

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Only force closed once but you can\'t edit food once you\'ve added it to your daily intake, i doubled a couple things because it didn\'t show on list and couldn\'t remove them
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unusable
reviews.comment: Could not even get app to start. Forced close every time.

reviews.title: Force closes!!!!!
reviews.comment: Would be a great app if it actually works but force closes as soon as you do anything.
